text: 2.39: Ais 57.19; Jol 2.28; FG 10.45; 14.27; Ef 2.13; 2.17Fhe Bakɨme fhum mba Ŋina Ŋaarar nden nɨɨn za suaŋgi, ana mba Ŋina Ŋaarar nden nɨɨŋv, ana vhɨra mba Ŋina Ŋaarar nden tarir nɨɨnga. Ana vhɨra mba saman harigi ŋguir ki gumgi gu mbigi gum zumgum hɨrga gumgi gu mbigi, ana vhɨra anan mben nɨɨnga. Nzan Fhe Bakɨme, ana mba kamgi gumgi gu mbigi, ana za won Ŋina Ŋaarar mben nɨɨn za suaŋgi.”
